data.name: href
data.description: If set, the button functions as a link to the specified URL.

data.name: position
data.description: Defines the horizontal alignment of the buttons. Can be 'start' for left alignment or 'end' for right alignment.

data.name: size
data.description: Specifies the size of the buttons.

data.name: direction
data.description: Sets the layout direction of the buttons. 'horizontal' arranges buttons side by side, while 'vertical' stacks them.

data.name: triggerEvent
data.description: Specifies how the button is activated. Can be 'click' for click activation or 'hover' for activation on hover.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Determines the roundness of the button corners.

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Controls the speed of the animation.

data.name: btnClasses
data.description: Allows custom classes to be added to the button for additional styling.

data.name: iconClasses
data.description: Allows custom classes to be added to the icon for additional styling.

data.name: ariaLabel
data.description: Accessible label for the button, defaults to the button label if it's a string.
